wikipedia_page.main: Farren Soutar  (born Joseph Farren Soutar; 17 February 1870 – 23 January 1962), was an English actor and singer who became known for his performances in Edwardian Musical Comedies in the West End and on Broadway.  Later he acted in some serious plays.  His mother was Nellie Farren, the famous principal boy in Victorian burlesque.
